titles.title: Caring for an Aging America Act
Caring for an Aging America Act
To include geriatrics and gerontology in the definition of "primary health services" under the National Health Service Corps program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Caring for an Aging America Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include geriatrics and gerontology within the definition of "primary health services" for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.
